NewRecordPage.Name: Add - User

Field.Name: Virtual1
Field.Label: Virtual1
Field.Formula: CASE WHEN target.[@field:Role] = 'EMP' Then 'Region Manager' WHEN target.[@field:Role] = 'MNG' Then 'Region' ELSE '' END

Field.Label: Region
Field.Formula: CASE WHEN target.[@field:Role] = 'MNG' or target.[@field:Role] = 'EMP' THEN '[@cbParamVirtual2]' ELSE '' END

Field.Label: Manager
Field.Formula:
CASE WHEN target.[@field:Role] = 'EMP' THEN
Try_Convert(integer, '[@cbParamVirtual3]')
ELSE Try_Convert(integer, '0') END

Acknowledgement.Subject: RMA – CRM
Acknowledgement.Body:
Hi [@field:FirstName],
Your account has been created. You can now login to our CRM using the following credentials: Email: [@field:Email] Password: caspio
Upon login, kindly change your password.
Thank you, Caspio Administrator

StandaloneRecordsetPage.PageHeader:
<style>


/*@media screen and (max-width: 768px)  {*/
/*@media screen and (max-width: 576px)  {


table[class^="cbResultSetTable"] > tbody > tr {
 display:inline-flex !important;
}

table[class^="cbResultSetTable"]{
 overflow-x:scroll !important;
}

table[class^="cbResultSetTable"] > tbody {
 display:inline-block !important;
}

.cbResultSetHeaderCell {
 width:50% !important;
}

}
*/

@media screen and (max-width: 576px)  {


table[class^="cbResultSetTable"] > tbody > tr > td:not(.cbInlineAddFormButtonContainer){
 width:150px !important;
        padding: 5px 15px !important;
        overflow:visible !important;
      
}

table[class^="cbResultSetTable"] > tbody > tr {
 display:inline-flex !important;
}

table[class^="cbResultSetTable"]{
 overflow-x:scroll !important;
}

table[class^="cbResultSetTable"] > tbody {
 display:inline-block !important;
}

.cbResultSetHeaderCell {
 width:50% !important;
}

}



</style>

Application.Name: Login Form
Application.HTMLWebPage:
<script>
if("[@authfield:Role]" == "ADM"){
window.location = "./admin/index.html";
}
else if ("[@authfield:Role]" == "MNG"){
window.location = "./manager/index.html";
}
else{
window.location = "./employee/index.html";
}
</script>

PasswordRecoveryPage.Name: Reset Password

EMailField.Subject: Password Reset
EMailField.Body:
Dear User,
We have received your request to reset your password.
Reset your password now by clicking on the link below. This link will expire within 2 hours of receiving this email.
[@field:#PasswordResetLink]
Thank you, Caspio

PasswordRecoveryPage.HTMLPageErr: The information you provided does not match our records. Please try again or contact us for assistance.
PasswordRecoveryPage.HTMLPageOk: Instructions to reset your password were sent to your email address. You will need to click on the provided link within 2 hours to complete your request.

FieldMatch.Label: For security purposes please verify your email address.
